title.rendered: Job Openings at Black Poison Tattoos Ahmedabad

content.rendered:
Career

Vacancy at Black Poison Tattoos

We are looking for like minded people.

If you are looking for a career in the Tattooing industry then this is your opportunity to start it. Just go through open vacancies and choose which suits you and apply for it.

Tattoo Artist
Visual Content Specialist
Chef
Web Designer
SEO executive
HR Intern
zoho developer
Studio Manager
Client Relationship Executive
Content Writer
Senior Operations Head
Sales Executive
Accounts Executive

Tattoo Artist

Black Poison Tattoos is looking for Tattoo artists to help create innovatively and implement, creative and trendy tattoo designs for our valuable clients. As a popular tattoo studio across the country as well as a government-registered tattoo training institute, we pride ourselves on providing unique designs and tattoos for our clients.

Job Description

  • Understanding client brief, exploring and conceptualizing a design solution, including drawing, sketching, and tattooing the client as per client expectations.
  • Ensuring the best tattoo experience by keeping in mind, tattoo placement, skin texture, and skin tone.
  • Abiding by the brief while coming up with creative suggestions whenever necessary, considering client personality as well as expectations 
  • Working with a cross-functional project team of tattoo artists, designers, marketing, and Customer Delight Partners. 
  • Maintaining a high level of hygiene at the studio at all times

Required Skills

  • Tattoo Artist with 2-3 experience in all kinds of tattoo styles with a strong creative portfolio.
  • Efficient utilization of interpersonal skills for liaising with the customer and cross-functional teams  
  • Ability to deal with various activities simultaneously, and perform admirably in high-pressure circumstances to convey quality undertakings, on schedule  
  • The mindset to learn and grow with the company includes keeping up with latest trends in tattooing as well as new health and safety procedures.
  • The ability to demonstrate that customer comes first by serving them with a sense of urgency
  • The ability to work as a team member to provide the highest level of customer service and professional customer interaction
  • Ability to guide customers in choosing elements that reflect personal style
  • Industry and organization recognition of designs & tattoos is good to have.
  • Experience in concept art and character design is good to have but not required.

Benefits

  • A culture that puts you and your growth first
  • Industry-leading pay – We focus on the money you earn so you can focus on work you love  
  • An opportunity to work alongside successful professionals from the industry
  • Constant and significant investment in your training and upskilling

    Apply Now

    Chef

    As a Studio Chef for our dynamic Tattoo Studio, you will be responsible for curating a culinary experience that complements the unique and vibrant atmosphere of our studio.

    This role involves crafting a menu of snacks and refreshments while managing the day-to-day operations of a small counter.

    We are seeking a skilled and creative chef who can enhance the overall customer experience by providing delicious and visually appealing food offerings.

    Key Responsibilities:

    Menu Development:

    • Create a diverse and appealing menu of snacks, soft drinks, and other refreshments that align with the studio’s atmosphere and customer preferences.
    • Consider dietary restrictions and preferences to ensure an inclusive menu.

    Food Preparation and Presentation:

    • Prepare and present food items with an emphasis on quality, flavour, and artistic presentation.
    • Ensure that all food items meet health and safety standards.

    Counter Management:

    • Oversee the daily operations of the snack counter, including inventory management, restocking, and cleanliness.
    • Provide excellent customer service, engaging with clients in a friendly and professional manner.

    Collaboration:

    • Coordinate with the Tattoo Studio management to align the culinary offerings with the overall brand and customer experience.
    • Collaborate with the Studio Chef to integrate food and beverage options into special events or promotions.

    Cost Control:

    • Monitor and manage inventory to minimize waste and control costs.
    • Source ingredients responsibly, balancing quality and affordability.

    Adaptability:

    • Adjust menu items and offerings based on customer feedback, seasonal changes, and emerging trends.
    • Stay informed about food and beverage trends to keep the menu fresh and appealing.

    Qualifications and Skills:

    • Proven experience as a chef or cook, with a focus on snack and refreshment preparation.
    • A culinary degree or relevant certification is a plus.
      Strong understanding of food safety and hygiene practices.
    • Creativity in designing visually appealing and delicious food items.
    • Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.

    Additional Requirements:

    • Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
    • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
    • Flexibility to adapt to the evolving needs of the studio.
    • Passion for delivering an exceptional customer experience.

    If you are a creative and skilled chef with a passion for enhancing the overall studio experience through culinary delights, we invite you to apply for the Studio Chef position and contribute to the unique atmosphere of our Tattoo Studio.

      Apply Now

      Web Designer

      Web Designer reports to Marketing Manager. The mission is to create, edit, update and maintain all the websites and blogs of our company.

      You are responsible to creatively design web-pages that will convert the visitors to leads while adhering to the brand guidelines of the company. You are also responsible to monitor the health of the websites and blogs, resolve day-to-day issues, improve the web-site performance, improve the SEO ranking and keep the website up-to-date with the information required by Black Poison Tattoos.

      Job Description & Required Skills

      We are looking for individuals who have the following skillset:

      • Create landing pages for marketing ad campaigns on WordPress.
      • Update/maintain our corporate website.
      • Implement SEO and content in collaboration with SEO experts and content development team.
      • Designing visual imagery for websites and ensuring that they are in line with our brand guidelines.
      • Embedding third party forms to capture leads.
      • Resolve code-level basic technical issues of the website.
      • Working on various CMSs.
      • Incorporating functionalities and features into websites.
      • Maintaining an understanding of the latest Web applications and programming practices through education, study, and participation in conferences, workshops, and groups.
      • Backing up the website and blogs.
      • Improve overall security of the website.

        Apply Now

        SEO Executive

        You will report to the Marketing Manager. Your mission is to work with the SEO team to analyze, develop and execute strategies to improve the organic traffic on our website.

        You will be responsible to execute on-site and off-site SEO optimization activities, backlinking, assist content creators to boost SEO ranking.

        Job Description

        • Conducting on-site and off-site analysis of web SEO competition.
        • Using google analytics, SEMrush and other tools to conduct performance reports regularly to measure the progress of the execution.
        • Analysing the trend and suggesting high-quality SEO content.
        • Assist blog writers and content developers
        • Daily back-linking (30+)
        • Leading keyword research and optimization of content.
        • Keeping up-to-date with developments in SEM.
        • Generating reports to help management track the progress.

        Required Skills

        We are looking for individuals who have the following skillset:

        • Marketing degree or related.
        • 3 Years or more experience in similar role
        • Extensive experience in SEO.
        • Working knowledge of Google Analytics.
        • Experience with coding techniques.
        • Thorough understanding of web design and site structures.
        • Good knowledge of back link analysis.

          Apply Now

          HR Intern

          We are looking for an HR Intern to perform various administrative tasks and support our HR department’s daily activities. HR Intern’s responsibilities include updating our employee records with new hire information, screening resumes, calling potential candidates, and scheduling interviews.

          Job Description

          • Updating company databases by inputting new employee contact information and employment details.
          • Screening potential employees’ resumes and application forms to identify suitable candidates to fill company job vacancies.
          • Organizing interviews with shortlisted candidates.
          • Posting job advertisements to job boards and social media platforms.
          • Removing job advertisements from job boards and social media platforms once vacancies have been filled.
          • Assisting the HR staff in gathering market salary information.
          • Assisting in the planning of company events.
          • Preparing and sending offer and rejection letters or emails to candidates.
          • Coordinating new hire orientations.
          • Responding to staff inquiries regarding HR policies, employee benefits, and other HRrelated matters.

          Required Skills

          • Bachelor’s degree in Human Resource Management or studying toward a degree in Human Resource Management or related field.
          • Proven experience working in an office environment.
          • Working knowledge of Indian Labor laws.
          • Familiarity with HRIS (Human Resources Information System) software is advantageous.
          • Proficiency in all Microsoft Office applications.
          • The ability to work as part of a team.
          • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
          • Excellent administrative and organizational skills.
          • Effective communication skills.
          • Detail-oriented.

            Apply Now

            Zoho Developer

            Your mission is to help the functional team to build/improvise/maintain the required set of Zoho One applications to run the operations smoothly. You are responsible to write critical custom codes/custom functions, integrating various Zoho Apps, fixing errors, upgrading systems, and resolving the gap between operational requirements and IT functional capability.

            Job Description

            • 2+ Experience in building or implementing requirements on any Zoho application
            • Experience in writing Zoho custom functions, with a deep understanding of Deluge
            • Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and design patterns, as well as with OO languages (Java, Ruby, C#, C++, etc)
            • Experience and knowledge of relational databases, including work with MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, or other common RDBMS
            • Knowledge of Agile development practices, particularly sprint planning and assessment

            Required Skills

            We are looking for individuals who have the following skillset: 

            • Modifying Zoho Apps to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces.
            • Directing system testing and validation procedures.
            • Working with departments on technical issues including software system design and maintenance.
            • Analyzing and plan the installation of new systems or modifications of an existing system.
            • Designing and developing Zoho systems using scientific analysis and mathematical models to predict and measure outcomes and design consequences.
            • Preparing reports on programming project specifications, activities, or status.
            • Conferring with project managers to obtain information on limitations or capabilities.

              Apply Now

              Studio Manager

              We are looking for a professional and customer service-oriented studio manager to oversee daily operations at our studio.

              As the studio manager, you will supervise the operational and organizational standards of the studio. Your duties will include undertaking administrative tasks, monitoring inventory levels, and developing business strategies.

              Responsibilities

              • Complete studio operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results
              • Maintain store staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employee
              • Prepare annual budget; schedule expenditures; analyze variances; initiate corrective actions
              • Ensure availability of merchandise and services by approving contracts; maintaining inventories
              • Analyze sales figures and forecast future sales
              • Respond to customer complaints and comments
              • Greet customers entering the studio with a smile and assist them with their needs
              • Describe services and tattoo procedures to customers and explain proper tattoo aftercare
              • Assist customers and artists with appointment scheduling
              • Understand and use Zoho CRM (Customer Relationship Management)

              Required Skills

              We are looking for individuals who have the following skillset: 

              • Graduate degree or it’s equivalent to at least 5 years of experience in the field or in a related area
              • Familiar with a variety of the field’s concepts, practices, and procedures.
              • Strong leadership and customer management abilities.
              • Customer service-oriented with in-depth knowledge of basic business management processes.
              • Excellent written and verbal communication skills

                Apply Now

                Client Relationship Executive

                To assist customer delight team with day-to-day tattoo studio operations which involves calling new leads, following up prospects, scheduling clients appointments, handling in-store customers, assisting artists and studio managers.

                Job Description

                • Calling new leads and follow ups to increase the revenue of the studio.
                • Scheduling appointments.
                • Studio management
                • Inventory tracking
                • Assisting tattoo artists and studio manager with studio operations
                • Capturing customer details as per the process.
                • Provide immersive customer service experience
                • Build client relationship and collect review/feedback/surveys
                • Understand the clients requirements and explain the right product or service

                Required Skills

                We are looking for individuals who have the following skillset: 

                • Bachelor’s degree or its equivalent at least 3 years of experience
                • Experience working on CRM
                • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
                • Great people skills and customer service skills
                • Previous sales or store management experience a strong plus

                  Apply Now

                  Visual Content Specialist

                  As a Tattoo Studio Visual Content Specialist, you will be the creative force behind capturing and presenting the unique artistry of our tattoo studio through visually compelling content.

                  Your role involves a combination of photography, videography, and content curation to showcase the studio’s work, individual artist portfolios, and the overall ambience. We are seeking a highly creative individual with a passion for tattoos and the ability to translate that passion into captivating visual narratives.

                  Key Responsibilities

                  Photography and Videography:

                  • Capture high-quality photographs and videos of the tattooing process, ensuring every detail is highlighted.
                  • Develop a keen understanding of each artist’s unique style and effectively translate it into visual content.

                  Content Curation:

                  • Build and maintain a visually stunning portfolio for the studio, emphasizing the diversity and artistry of the tattoo work.
                  • Create individualized artist portfolios that showcase their skills, specialties, and personal style.

                  Social Media Management:

                  • Develop engaging multimedia content for the studio’s social media channels, including Instagram, Facebook, and other relevant platforms.
                  • Stay current with social media trends and implement strategies to enhance the studio’s online presence.

                  Collaboration:

                  • Work closely with tattoo artists and the marketing team to align visual content with overall branding and promotional strategies.
                  • Collaborate on themed photoshoots or events to enhance the studio’s image.

                  Editing and Post-Production:

                  • Edit and enhance raw footage and photographs to maintain a consistent and cohesive visual style.
                  • Ensure a quick turnaround for content delivery, especially for time-sensitive promotions or events.

                  Qualifications and Skills:

                  • Proven experience as a visual content specialist, photographer, or videographer, with a portfolio showcasing relevant work.
                  • Proficiency in using professional photography and videography equipment, as well as editing software (e.g.,
                  • Adobe Creative Suite).
                    Strong understanding of composition, lighting, and visual storytelling.
                  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with tattoo artists and the marketing team.
                  • Creative thinking and the ability to bring fresh ideas to the table.

                  Additional Requirements:

                  • Flexibility to work during studio hours, including evenings and weekends.
                  • Passion for tattoos, art, and a keen interest in the tattoo industry.
                  • Respect for client privacy and the ability to navigate sensitive situations professionally.
                  • If you are a visually creative individual with a passion for tattoo artistry and storytelling, we invite you to apply for the
                  • Tattoo Studio Visual Content Specialist position and contribute to the visual identity of our vibrant studio.
                   

                    Apply Now

                    Content Writer

                    Our company is in need of a talented Content Writer to create compelling blog posts, white papers, product descriptions, social media content, and web copy.

                    We’re looking for someone who will help us expand our digital footprint and drive more value through online content.

                    Job Description

                    • Create content marketing campaigns to drive leads and subscribers 
                    • Use SEO best practices to generate traffic to our site 
                    • Regularly produce various content types, including email, social media posts, blogs, and white papers
                    • Actively manage and promote our blog, and pitch articles to relevant third-party platforms
                    • Edit content produced by other members of the team
                    • Analyze content marketing metrics and makes changes as needed
                    • Collaborate with other departments to create innovative content ideas

                    Required Skills

                    • Bachelor’s degree in English, Journalism or related field
                    • Knowledge of digital marketing tactics, including SEO, email marketing and web analytics
                    • Excellent writing skills, as well as the ability to communicate and collaborate effectively
                    • The ability to consistently meet tight deadlines
                    • At least two years of experience writing for a B2B & B2C audience
                    • Experience using WordPress, Wix preferred 

                      Apply Now

                      Senior Operations Head

                      We are looking for an analytical, target-driven, and people-focused operations leader to lead operations and expansion for us pan India.

                      As senior Operations Head, you must be a problem solver and contribute to 3 areas – Revenue Delivery, Process Improvement, and Strategic Insight.

                      You must be able to proactively collaborate across functional Leadership to enable strategy, operational efficiency, cost optimization, attainment of savings goals, and the mitigation of risk across the organization.

                      Job Description

                      • Develop actionable business strategies and plans that ensure alignment with short-term and long-term objectives​
                      • Foster and support the implementation of business solutions by building relationships and partnerships with key stakeholders
                      • Drive data-based analyses to arrive at solutions or opportunities without compromising our strategy.
                      • Translate strategy into actionable goals for performance and growth with a focus on new franchise development
                      • Analyze internal operations and identify areas of process enhancement
                      • Maintain and build trusted relationships with key customers, clients, partners, and stakeholders
                      • Coach and guide the operations team to achieve business objectives

                      Required Skills

                      We are looking for individuals who have the following skillset: 

                      • Bachelor’s degree in business administration, or related field
                      • 10-15 years of experience in executive leadership positions; preferably in retail, MSME’s or start-ups
                      • Certified Coach (preferable, not a must-have)
                      • Leadership skills, with steadfast resolve and personal integrity
                      • Understanding of advanced business planning and regulatory issues
                      • A solid grasp of data analysis and performance metrics
                      • Be able to diagnose problems quickly and have foresight into potential issues

                        Apply Now

                        Sales Executive

                        We are looking for an experienced, passionate, and motivated Sales Executive to join our sales team! As our Sales Executive, your main responsibility will be to drive our business success by implementing a strong and sustainable sales strategy. Your and your team’s main goal will be to turn leads and prospects into paid users.

                        Job Description

                        • Call & convert students for admission in our School for learning Tattoo Art.
                        • Establish, develop and maintain positive  business and customer relationships.
                        • Reach out to customers through cold calling.
                        • Achieve agreed upon Sales Targets and outcomes within deadlines / Schedule.
                        • Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends.
                        • Continuously improve through feedback.

                        Required Skills

                        • Excellent communication, selling and negotiation skills.
                        • Bachelor’s degree ( Optional in case experience more than 1 year )
                        • Proven work experience as a Sales Executive ( minimum 1 year )
                        • Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in Sales.
                        • Sales Planning and motivation for Sales.

                          Apply Now

                          Accounts Executive

                          We’re looking for an organized and driven Accounts Executive to join our growing team at our company. The Accounts Executive will work closely with our other accountants and operations personnel and handle day-to-day bookkeeping.

                          Responsibilities

                          • Perform monthly, quarterly, and annual accounting activities with coordination and completion of annual audits and reviewing financial reports/support as necessary.
                          • Finalization of Accounts, Statement of Accounts, Debtors Controls Accounts, Buffer Accounts, Balance sheet Statement.
                          • Maintain all records like Vouchers, Receipts, Bills, Payments, Bank Reconciliation, Monthly GST Working, Reconciliation of Sundry Debtors & creditors, and Handling petty Cash Records.
                          • Maintain Sales Purchase Registers & Keep Software properly
                          • Banking works like a Cheques issue for clearing Cash Deposit, NEFT, and RTGS
                          • Analyse and report on financial status, including income statement variances, communicating financial results to management, budget preparation, and analysis
                          • Prepare and file taxes for companies and individuals by analyzing all company assets, income, anticipated expenses, and liabilities to reach a total tax obligation for the year. After the analysis is complete, suggest recommendations on reducing total tax liabilities in the future.
                          • Improve systems and procedures and initiate corrective actions.

                          Required Skills

                          We are looking for individuals who have the following skillset: 

                          • A Bachelor degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field, or an equivalent combination of education, training and experience or Semi Qualified CA
                          • 2-5 years of accounting/finance experience
                          • Demonstrate intermediate to advanced skills and knowledge of Excel, as well as other Microsoft Office applications
                          • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
                          • Experience with accounting software
                          • Excellent interpersonal skills to communicate effectively across the organization
                          • Thorough knowledge of general ledger accounting and account reconciliation
                          • Highly detail-oriented.

                            Apply Now

                            We care about the art we create.

                            At Black Poison Tattoo Studio, you will always find a friendly, courteous, professional staff dedicated to the art of Tattooing & Body Piercing.

                            Why Black Poison Tattoos?

                            Black Poison Tattoo Studio uses the best of equipments, world class standards of tattooing and our Hygiene standards meet International levels.

                            Packed Needles are opened in front of you and after the tattoo is completed, it is either given back to you or destroyed. Also everything that touches your skin is new like the needles, ink caps, gloves, razors etc to make your tattooing experience a memory for lifetime.

                            Black Poison Tattoo Studio features a team of highly skilled artists, who share a passion for tattooing and for connecting with clients to bring their artistic visions to life.

                            Our Aim

                            Black Poison Tattoo Studio is committed and is religiously working for the growth of Tattoo Art in Ahmedabad, India.

                            We see all big cities of India have already given a nod to the potential of this art. Providing quality information to anyone who needs will surely help this art getting the deserved Love and Respect.

                            Our aim to provide you with a piece of art you will be proud to wear. We offer a clean, friendly and professional studio to ensure that your tattoo experience is as enjoyable as possible. 100% privacy and comfort is guaranteed during your appointment.

                            Our Experience

                            Mr. Jack and Robby (Raju) have over 13 combined years of tattoo experience in Black Poison Tattoos.

                            They are full time artists and opened up Black Poison in June of 2010. Jack’s artistry in tattooing and drawing started around that time, and as you can see by the artwork.

                            Nowadays Black Poison Tattoos build up a highly skilled tattoo artists team, who share a passion for tattooing and for connecting with clients to bring their artistic visions to life… Black Poison is a one of the outstanding custom tattooist in the tattoo industry, The artists at Black Poison have experienced in all type of tattoo designs.
